entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
